note.p: Judge of poultry exhibitions. Resided in Sparkbrook, Birmingham. Married Ann Leeson, a poulterer’s daughter, in 1860.
Birmingham, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2017)
Birmingham, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754-1937 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2017)
